Classes

class  pp::MediaStreamAudioTrack
 The MediaStreamAudioTrack class contains methods for receiving audio buffers from a MediaStream audio track in the browser. More...

Namespaces

namespace  pp

Detailed Description

This file defines the MediaStreamAudioTrack interface for an audio source resource, which receives audio buffers from a MediaStream audio track in the browser.
